entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Support resolving all service keys associated with keyed DI instances #100105
  • How to Obtain a Method Pointer Without Reflection in NativeAOT? #100103
  • System.IO.Path.GetRelativePath is returning incorrect values when used within a case-sensitive directory #100102
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Assertion failed '(varDsc->lvIsParam && !varDsc->lvIsRegArg) || isPrespilledArg' when running SVE unit tests #100101
    9.0.0
  • Assertion on rsthread.cpp:5902 taAmbient != NULL #100098
    9.0.0
  • The System.Text.Json source generator doesn't populate `JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider` metadata. #100095
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Tests.HttpListenerRequestTests fail with SocketException : Connection refused #100088
  • ConcurrentStack.TryPopRange breaks down under contention #100083
  • JIT: Investigate relationship of basic block's `bbCodeOffs` + `bbCodeOffsEnd` and its statements' `DebugInfo` #100079
  • `TypeLoadException` when using a type containing a static `ImmutableArray<T>` property when `Main` is async #100077
  • [API Proposal]: Add a STJ feature flag treating non-optional constructor parameters as required #100075
    9.0.0
  • `ilverify` not installed as `dotnet-ilverify` #100069
  • mono gc not set static field back after object moved when enable hotreload #100065
  • System.Net.Quic.QuicStream drops data when system CPU is under high load #100064
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 16 Regressions on 3/14/2024 6:24:18 PM #100085
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 3/18/2024 9:28:21 PM #100090
  • Request timed out #100062
  • LINQ Client-Side Evaluation with a Cast in the Select Clause #100061
  • does coreclr support ios platform? #100055
  • Test failure: GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\gettotalmemory\\gettotalmemory.cmd #100053

Closed

  • Decimal validation against XSD #96610
  • XDocument parses strings with ASCII HTML number to ASCII Symbol #98810
  • .Net 6.0 XDocument XML Giving Wrong Value of an Element (Bug) #99899
  • `Console.ReadKey` throws `InvalidOperationException` on Ctrl+S #99938
  • Assertion failed 'lastBlockILEndOffset < beginOffs' #99543
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Assertion failed: 0 <= fd && fd < sysconf(_SC_OPEN_MAX) #99520
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] emscripten_check_mailbox per console character #93603
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Assert failed: Cannot find Promise for JSHandle -2 #98406
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] lock_thread: g_assert (thread->longlived->synch_cs) #98604
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] wait.value.then is not a function #99801
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.ReadsClosedFinishes_ConnectionClose CI test failure #99142
    9.0.0
  • Access violation (crashes the process) while writing EventSource events #99603
    9.0.0
  • Question about GetFoldedArithOpResultHandleFlags() #100059
    9.0.0
  • "error: out of range pc-relative fixup value" on linux-armel checked CoreCLR_NonPortable #100047
  • System.Text.Json: `JsonUnmappedMemberHandling.Disallow` throws when using `JsonPolymorphicAttribute` #100057
  • Failure building runtime from tag v8.0.3 - missing version of Microsoft.Native.Quic.MsQuic.Schannel #99978
  • HttpClient getting deadlocked on InvalidateHttp2Connection #98945
    9.0.0
  • [browser] ComputeWasmPublishAssets incorrectly upgrades compressed asset versions of assets that are not included as part of publish. #99917
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Keep track of additional JS keepalive sources for worker threads #85052
    9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] `HttpClient_CancelInDifferentThread` failing with operation cancelled #98101
    9.0.0
  • EqualityComparer<K>.Default.Equals intrinsic special criteria? #100058
  • [API Proposal]: System.Net.Http.PipeReaderContent #100019
  • I need to modify the value of string type if the property name is "xyz" in JsonConverter<string> using System.Text.Json #100045
  • Optimization System.Text.Json source generation #100068
  • [QUIC] Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #98354
    9.0.0
  • Possible race condition in System.IO.Pipelines: InvalidCastException in (System.Memory's)System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence.GetFirstBuffer #27580
    Future
  • Web api response is occasionally delayed #13042
  • [mono] io exception in thread will call crash #96437
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\NoGCRegion\\Callback_Svr\\Callback_Svr.cmd #100052
  • Memory leaking when calling ECDsa.Create(ECParameters) on Linux container #100037

PullRequests

Created

  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Simplify description of the SList data structure #100107
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap where possible #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Detect non-core Enums. #100104
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove remaining SVE references from emitarm64.cpp #100100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove s_classificationSizeTable entries which are not used #100097
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move the Evaluate Paths job to a separate stage #100096
    area-Infrastructure
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add a note about slow build analysis updates #100092
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Add support for struct returns from Swift reverse pinvokes #100091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make IF_SVE_FZ_2A and IF_SVE_HG_2A consistent with similar groups #100089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58 #100084
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add templated register encoding methods #100081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add more templated encode immediate methods #100078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] [net7] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #100063
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 7.0.x
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Enable constant CSE for ARM #100054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100050
    area-Interop-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix pathing issue for corerun copying in Mono runs #100036
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Update IL offsets in `fgExpandStaticInitForCall` #99662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix building ILC in Visual Studio #99799
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Make sure that we get the RECEIVE before connection close on test #100093
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Defer parsing of wasm stack symbolication maps #99974
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix AV in HttpTelemetry.WriteEvent #99607
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.5
  • Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #100031
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Add basic support for Swift reverse pinvokes #100018
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add limited constant propagation to the jiterpreter for ldc.i4 and ldloca #99706
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Update syntax for PC relative offsets in ARM assembly #100066
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove GetFoldedArithOpResultHandleFlags #100060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete TestProjectFixture and associated helpers #99847
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_decode_row_col_raw #99939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix Http2 deadlock #99889
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix filtering compressed assets for pdb during publish #100016
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] invocation of user JS in UI thread till next event loop tick #100040
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove invalid Unsafe.As from array helpers #99778
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] further improve HTTP cancelation #100029
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Mark BigMul as AggressiveInlining #100027
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to interpret m2n wrapper if it is not found in aot image #100025
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • Remove duplicative sorting when enumerating OrderBy.Take/Skip #99973
    area-System.Linq

Updated

  • [IGNORE] Test 1es-windows-2022-open Windows build #100038
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Move various thread-local objects that were used in self-contained places out of Thread #99989
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Move Interlocked null checks to managed, RhpLockCmpXchg64 to C #100021
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Change the CryptoKit interop entrypoints to use the Swift calling convention #99970
    area-System.Security
  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure `Array.Resize` creates an array of the same type as the incoming array #99021
    area-System.Runtime, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • Improve the throughput of SocketsHttpHandler's HTTP/1.1 connection pool #99364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Skip ro segments which are not in range when walking heap for GC diagnostics #100002
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Trim unused interfaces #100000
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Optimize memory allocations (#98702) #99542
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • LogicalName added for EmbeddedResource #99999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [NOREVIEW] Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • BlobBuilder.LinkSuffix/LinkPrefix need to Free zero length chunks #100039
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Use msquic package in stress tests #99987
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Swift bindings generator with simple parser and emitter #2525
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.2] Inconsistent messaging of success vs. warnings from dotnet test #39665
  • Pipeline - Project Requires Installation of .Net Workloads: Maui-Tizen (dotnet core 8.0.203) #39667
  • 8.0.203 for Ubuntu not published on Microsoft repo #39664
  • ApiCompat does not notice breaking change in generic constraints #39659
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64]Download .net9preview3 x86sdk on ARM64OS access is denied for dotnet. #39649

Closed

  • Invalid Version.Details.xml file in main #39658
  • dotnet tool install should implicitly do dotnet tool update (same for dotnet workload install/update) #28664
    9.0.1xx
  • dotnet nuget sign error: Unknown error (0xc100000d) #39640
  • dotnet watch run ... is passing extra argument #29145
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.SDK Has reference to non existent Target #39148
  • Why is the launch profile not being passed into `dotnet watch run` correctly? #32233

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent the Roslyn compiler package from being used on .NET Core MSBuild #39666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39647
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Clean up version files #39660
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Remove intermediate for format #39650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update EOL versions #39645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2410250 #39615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Merged

  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895

Updated

  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #8012

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editorconfig in nuget package is not respected when NUGET_PACKAGES does not end with trailing slash #72657
  • Regions should be included in code block grouping #72641
  • IDE0300 triggered for `dynamic` target type #72640
  • Search in options window doesn't show all matches in the pages tree view #72639
  • Navigation to source link is broken #72638
  • VS .editorConfig UI does not handle different settings for different languages. #72637
  • SemanticModel.GetDeconstructionInfo returns different results for not accessible call with/without await #72634
  • Move type code fix results in compile error with primary constructors #72632
    Backlog
  • InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile is failing in integration tests. #72627

Closed

  • Hitting Debug.Assert in `LocalRewriter_CompoundAssignmentOperator` when compiling Razor.sln #72626
    17.10
  • Add public API to determine if a call is being intercepted #72093
    17.10
  • Use Pattern Matching suggestion gives faulty code #72370
    Backlog
  • Doc comment completions should not insert `=""` if there is already one #72259
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: Suggestion `IDE0300` does not appear for arguments in primary constructor's base class constructor #72337
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent dispose behavior between `await using` and `await foreach` #72573
    17.10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34720.100 #72629

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes for Linux release build #72658
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Experimenting with segmented collection changes #72656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to SegmentedList for line indexes #72652
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Introduce a concept of internal special types, move all members defined in special types to the SpecialMember set. #72646
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2410756 #72644
    auto-merge
  • Emit extensions as plain struct types #72643
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Remove unnecessary string[] allocations #72642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Hande error scenarios involving target types and named arguments in nullable walker #72635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for Copilot #72655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Start new compiler test project as Emit2 is reaching text limit #72649
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Account for un-lowered nodes in CanChangeValueBetweenReads #72651
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Unify C# and VB implementations of TestCompletionInLinkedFiles #72653
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in SolutionCompilationState.CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused resource strings #72648
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72650
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Remove unnecessary component load #72647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not include privates when emitting skeleton references #72645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.9] Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72630
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress preexisting SDL errors #72633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Replay Binary Log Tool #72619
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for PrimaryConstructorBaseType to SpeculativeAnalyser #72421
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Prefer pattern-based over interface-based disposal in await using #72598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Break added documents into batches when processing solution/compilation translation states. #72621
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Disable integration tests #72628
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't classify regex/json in binary string addition #72620
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Be resilient to asset-cache mutating while retrieving assets from the host #72599
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update EOL versions #72623
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Log build host stack trace in exception handling #72624
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Recover from wrong collection expression target type in nullable walker #72616
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support multiple OpenAPI documents per application #54676
  • Improve Error message when using Editform or Add Analyzers for VS to help you out #54674
  • Crash due to INVALID_POINTER_READ_c0000005_aspnetcorev2_inprocess.dll!STRU::SafeVsnwprintf #54673
  • 1ES template cleanup #54672
  • WebSockets.AcceptWebSocketAsync disables custom exception handler #54671
  • asp.net core angular template doesn't work in github pipeline as nodejs doesn't found in environment #54670
  • Null value being passed to the Claim constructor in the UserClaimsPrincipalFactory<TUser> on Identity Endpoint Login .Net 8 #54669
  • Add Perhaps additional event to the component life cycle for SSR pages #54668
  • Blazor WASM - API authorization disappears on refresh #54666
  • Blazor WASM with Microsoft Identity Platform within iframes #54665
  • Combine MapWhen with UseAuthorization and many Endpoints is slow #54664
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, multiple_queries #54661
  • [Blazor]: Why enhance naviagation would clear the <head> element? #54658
  • InteractiveAutoRenderMode(prerender:false)) does not use interactive server rendering #54657

Closed

  • Issue with Dot Net Core MVC #54645
  • Perf regression: caching #54638
  • Perf regression: mapaction, multiple_queries #54662
  • Excessive memory usage with MapControllerRoute or MapDynamicControllerRoute #54295
  • Performance with many Blazor Assemblies #54652

PullRequests

Created

  • Change how the key ring cache is updated #54675
    area-dataprotection
  • [Blazor] Update NPM dependencies #54667
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54660
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Convert to 1ES templates #54656
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Preserve RemoteAuthenticationContext during trimming if used in JS interop #54655
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.5

Merged

  • Fix version files missing from publishing #54663
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Switch to 1ES templates #54651
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54448
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview4
  • Fix Java discovery in helix-matrix pipeline #54631
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Fix route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Behavior<Layout<View>> causes InvalidOperationException: "bindable not an instance of AssociatedType" #21376
  • Android TalkBack screen reader doesn't tell the user which item is selected in a .NET MAUI CollectionView #21375
  • Error when adding to ObservableCollection #21374
    .NET 8 SR4
  • New Property "MaximumFontSize" #21370
  • [Android] image AspectFill is not honored #21368
  • iOS Publishing uses project name and ignores bundle identifier #21365
  • VS2022 (v 17.9.3) will not hit breakpoints in a Task #21364
  • [net9.0] Control iOS device tests don't finish #21362
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SecureStorage.Default.GetAsync not able to retrieve value set on another page. #21361
  • Windows/UWP crashes on 8.0.10 #21360
  • [iOS] CollectionView with GroupHeader/GroupFooter crashes #21359
  • Xamarin Forms Android WebView Background Image works. MAUI Android WebView Background Image doesn't work #21355
  • MAUI Community Toolkit EventToCommandBehavior Fails to Pass EventArgs Arguments in Versions > 1.0 #21354
  • Request for disambiguation of NativeReference and ObjCBindingLibrary #21352

Closed

  • Windows app installs on Wndows 10 but fails to install on Windows 11 as it keeps asking for .NET even after installation of .NET 8? #20084
  • Label doesn't render correctly when in a Grid with column definitions #10494
    .NET 8 SR4
  • WebView in MAUI project doesn't scroll when has a PDF file loaded #21346
  • [regression/7.0.100] MAUI SR9 7.0.100 breaks iOS build #18573
  • [WinUI 3] Windows App Title Bar Buttons Have Button Shadows in .NET8 after project upgrade from .NET7 #18773
  • The text of the buttons of an Alert is not displayed correctly in windows. #18759
  • How i can create v2ray VPN connection in MAUI? for Android, Windows and IOS? #21348
  • QueryParameter does not passd into ViewModel when BindingContext is defined inside xaml by RelativeSource binding on page. #9549
  • Custom BindableRadioGroup is not working #17445
  • VisualStates are not being applied to items in a CollectionView using DataTemplates in Release Mode #9756
  • Viewcell tap gesture not working with datatemplate selector in MAUI 8.0 #20857
  • [MacCatalyst] FilePicker focuses on wrong window after selecting file #17447
  • Can't find debug target or "{}" #21182
  • Integrated Hello World Maui startup project crashes after splashscreen on iOS 16.5.1 and .NET8.0 in release mode. #19522
